mapper.select: SELECT PDT_NAME ,WO_END_DATE ,STATUS ,COMMENTS ,USE_YN ,WORK_ORDER_NO ,WORK_END_DATE ,DUE_DATE ,ORDER_DATE ,WORK_ORDER_CODE ,WORK_START_DATE ,EMP_NAME ,WO_NO ,WO_CODE ,MP_NO ,PDT_CODE ,PRC_CODE ,LINE_CODE ,EMP_ID ,WO_DATE ,WO_QTY ,WO_START_DATE ,ORDER_QTY FROM WORK_ORDER WHERE WO_STATUS_CODE = 'PS'

SELECT PDT_NAME ,WO_END_DATE ,STATUS ,COMMENTS ,USE_YN ,WORK_ORDER_NO ,WORK_END_DATE ,DUE_DATE ,ORDER_DATE ,WORK_ORDER_CODE ,WORK_START_DATE ,E.EMP_NAME ,WO_NO ,WO_CODE ,MP_NO ,PDT_CODE ,PRC_CODE ,LINE_CODE ,W.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID ,WO_DATE ,WO_QTY ,WO_START_DATE ,ORDER_QTY FROM WORK_ORDER W JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON W.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE W.WO_CODE = #{data}

SELECT ROWNUM AS IDX, LEVEL AS BOM_LEVEL, CHILD_ITEM_CODE, PARENT_PDT_CODE, ITEM_TYPE, BOM_PRC_TYPE, BOM_QTY, BOM_UNIT, LTRIM(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CHILD_ITEM_CODE, ' ← '), ' ← ') AS PATH FROM BOM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH CHILD_ITEM_CODE = #{data} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_PDT_CODE = CHILD_ITEM_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY CHILD_ITEM_CODE

SELECT DISTINCT CODE, BOM_PRC_TYPE FROM ( SELECT PARENT_PDT_CODE AS CODE, BOM_PRC_TYPE FROM BOM START WITH PARENT_PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR CHILD_ITEM_CODE = PARENT_PDT_CODE
UNION
SELECT CHILD_ITEM_CODE AS CODE, BOM_PRC_TYPE FROM BOM START WITH PARENT_PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR CHILD_ITEM_CODE = PARENT_PDT_CODE )ORDER BY CODE
SELECT PRC_TYPE_CODE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode}
SELECT DISTINCT PARENT_PDT_CODE FROM BOM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH CHILD_ITEM_CODE = #{pdtCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_PDT_CODE = CHILD_ITEM_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT CHILD_ITEM_CODE FROM BOM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH CHILD_ITEM_CODE = #{pdtCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_PDT_CODE = CHILD_ITEM_CODE

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS P LEFT JOIN MATERIAL_TYPE M ON P.MTL_TYPE_CODE = M.MTL_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN WEIGHT_UNIT W ON P.WT_TYPE_CODE = W.WT_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN LENGTH_UNIT L ON P.LT_TYPE_CODE = L.LT_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TYPE P2 ON P.PDT_TYPE = P2.PDT_TYPE_CODE WHERE P.PDT_USEYN = 'Y' AND P.PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode}
